text.string: Fund your spending balance to enjoy instant and cheap transactions with friends, family, and merchants.
You can use your Bitkit savings or send bitcoin from a different wallet.

text_blocked.string: At this time, Bitkit cannot provide automatic Lightning connections to residents of the United States and Canada.

text.string: Scan a QR to claim your LNURL Channel from another LSP, or choose manual setup.

description.string: Before you can transfer funds from your savings balance, you need to send bitcoin to your Bitkit wallet.

text.string: Transfer funds to your spending balance to enjoy instant and cheap transactions with friends, family, and merchants.
Sorry, Bitkit could not set up your spending balance or complete your transfer. Please try again.

description.string: The amount you can transfer to your spending balance is currently limited to ₿ {amount}.

text.string:
Your spending balance in Bitkit is like your internet connection. Instead of bandwidth, you pay for liquidity and payment routing.

Payments to and from your spending balance are cheaper, faster, and more private than regular Bitcoin transactions.

The network fee and service provider fee are one-time costs to set up your balance.
Transfer your spending balance to your savings to store your Bitcoin long-term and secure your future.
Funds transfer to savings is usually instant, but settlement may take up to <accent>14 days</accent> under certain network conditions.
You can transfer part of your spending balance to savings, because you have multiple active Lightning Connections.
Please wait, your funds transfer is in progress. This should take <accent>±10 seconds.</accent>
Funds were not transferred yet. Bitkit will try to initiate the transfer during the next <accent>30 minutes</accent>. Please keep your app open.

text_spending.string: Your funds have been transferred and your spending balance is ready to use.

text_savings.string: Your funds have been transferred. You are able to use these funds immediately.

text.string: You can use an external node to manually open a Lightning connection. Enter the node details to continue.
Lightning connection initiated. You will be able to use your spending balance in <accent>±30 minutes</accent> (depends on node configuration).

error_channel_setup_msg.string: An error occurred when setting up your instant balance. {raw}

error_channel_receiving.string: Receiving amount needs to be greater than ${usdValue}

setting_up_text.string: Please wait, your funds transfer is in progress. This should take <accent>±10 minutes.</accent>

node_failed.string: Bitkit failed to initialize the Lightning node.

error_logs_description.string: Bitkit was not able to export the LDK logs.

error_add.string: Bitkit could not add the Lightning peer.

error_add_uri.string: The URI appears to be invalid.

peer_saved.string: The Lightning peer was successfully added and saved.

description.string: The funds on your spending balance have been transferred to your savings.

close_error_msg.string: Unable to transfer your funds back to savings. Please try again.

close_success_msg.string: Your funds are being transferred back to your savings.

close_text.string:
The fee to close this Lightning Connection and transfer your funds back to your savings depends on network conditions.

Funds transfer to savings is usually instant, but settlement may take up to <accent>14 days</accent> under certain network conditions.

force_text.string: Could not initiate transfer. Do you want to force this transfer? You won’t be able to use these funds for ±14 days (!)

force_init_msg.string: Your funds will be accessible in ±14 days.

force_failed_msg.string: Unable to transfer your funds back to savings. Please try again.

channel_opened_msg.string: You can now pay anyone, anywhere, instantly.

order_given_up_msg.string: The setup process expired. Please try again.

order_expired_msg.string: The setup process expired. Please try again.

wait_text_top.string: Please wait for Bitkit to connect to the payment network (±10 seconds).
